articles.description: Aged care facilities are vowing not to relax restrictions on visitors just yet, saying they need to protect the safety of their residents.
articles.content:
Updated 
April 22, 2020 23:29:59
Providers of aged care across the country are opting not to relax restrictions on visits despite advice from the Chief Medical Officer and the Prime Minister, industry groups say.

articles.title: NSW man issued coronavirus fine after running from police, arguing he was ‘exercising’ - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The man has been charged for breaching coronavirus rules after police refused to buy his excuse.
articles.content:
A Sydney man has been charged for breaching coronavirus rules after police refused to buy his excuse.
Officers responding to reports of a group congregating on Carriage Street, in Austral, spotted two men fleeing the scene.

articles.title: The Coronavirus May Be Doing Something Strange to Your Toes - Futurism
articles.description: "We don’t know for sure if it’s related to COVID-19."
articles.content:
Health practitioners are noticing a strange new sign that patients could be carrying the coronavirus without symptoms such as a dry cough or fever.
The media and even some health experts are now referring to the condition as COVID toes mysterious blue or red… [+1419 chars]
